name: nventiveCanaryUpdater
description:
A task to update a Canary build. The update is split in 3 phases :
 - Optional: merge of the canary branch with a given target branch (usually master) 
 - Update of the NuGet packages; the versions used by the updater are calculated through the branch name (canaries/dev for dev, canaries/beta+dev for beta and stable, etc.); stable is always appended to the versions. 
 - Optional: commit the changes and push the changes.
author: nventive

inputs.name: solution
inputs.label: Solution to update
inputs.helpMarkDown: The solution to update

inputs.name: usePrivateFeed
inputs.label: Use packages from this Azure DevOps account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether to use packages from this Azure DevOps account

inputs.name: nugetFeed
inputs.label: Source Feed
inputs.helpMarkDown: The NuGet feed from which to update the packages

inputs.name: useNuGetOrg
inputs.label: Use packages from NuGet.org
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether packages from NuGet.org should be updated

inputs.name: mergeBranch
inputs.label: Merge with working branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Merge the code from the current branch with a working branch.

inputs.name: branchToMerge
inputs.label: Branch to merge
inputs.helpMarkDown: The branch to merge changes from.

inputs.name: isBranchToMergeAway
inputs.label: Branch to merge is in another repository

inputs.name: mergeRepositoryConnection
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Service connection to connect to the repository where the target branch is located.

inputs.name: pushMergeBranch
inputs.label: Push merge branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Push the branch used for the merge to the current repository. The build service must be given the right to contribute and create branches in the repository.

inputs.name: pushBranch
inputs.label: Push updated branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Push the updated branch to the repository. The build service must be given the right to contribute and create branches in the repository.

inputs.name: gitUserName
inputs.label: Git user name
inputs.helpMarkDown: The email for Git to use when executing operations.

inputs.name: gitUserEmail
inputs.label: Git user email
inputs.helpMarkDown: The name for Git to use when executing operations.

inputs.name: summaryFile
inputs.label: Summary file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a file where to write the package update and git merge summary

inputs.name: resultFile
inputs.label: Result file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to a file where to write the result of the update

inputs.name: nugetUpdaterVersion
inputs.label: NuGet Updater version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The of the NuGet updater to use. See https://www.nuget.org/packages/nventive.nuget.updater.tool for the list of available versions

inputs.name: nugetVersion
inputs.label: Target Versions
inputs.helpMarkDown: The versions to update packages to; use comma-separated values; defaults to the name of the branch + stable

inputs.name: allowDowngrade
inputs.label: Allow downgrade
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the packages can be downgraded if the matching version is lower

inputs.name: strict
inputs.label: Use strict update
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates whether the version found should only contain the target tag (ie. dev) or can contain other tags as well (ie. dev.test)

inputs.name: packageAuthor
inputs.label: Package author
inputs.helpMarkDown: Filters the packages to update to the ones from a specific author; only applies to NuGet.org packages

inputs.name: ignorePackages
inputs.label: Ignore Packages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which packages (separated by ';') to exclude from the update

inputs.name: updatePackages
inputs.label: Update Packages
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indicates which packages (separated by ';') to update. If null, all found pacakges will be updated.

inputs.name: additionalPublicSources
inputs.label: Additional Public Sources
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional public package sources from where to update; separate sources on different lines

inputs.name: useVersionOverrides
inputs.label: Use version overrides
inputs.helpMarkDown: Whether or not to use a version overrides file

inputs.name: versionOverridesFile
inputs.label: Version overrides file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path/URL to a file to use for the version overrides
